charges.charge_description: Possession of a Firearm by an Illegal Alien in violation of Title 18 USC Section 922(g)(5)

charges.charge_offence_description: Possession of a Firearm by an Illegal Alien in vio

charges.charge_description: Alien in possession of a firearm(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 1: Bureau of Prisons - 33 months - Supervised Release - 3 years with special conditions imposed - Special Assessment - $100.00 due in full immediately - Defendant shall support dependants while incarcerated - Recommendations by the Court: Place of incarceration at the Federal Correctional Institution in Butner, North Carolina. Remanded to custody.
